data.rule: Claim 1 resource from the discard pile or discard 2 resources from the deck
If this mech is played to a battle and claims an uncontested resource, you may reveal this mech to claim an additional resource from the deck. If you do, disable this mech.
If this mech is not in the arena, it loses.
If all opposing mechs have 5 or less power, this mech loses
If all opposing mechs have 10 or more power, this mech wins
All opposing mechs with an EVEN power are removed from battle and disabled
If this mech is the only mech in battle, it wins
You may swap this mech from your hand with your mech in battle
Take control of one of the opposing mechs. That mech's owner takes control of hijack.
Discard up to 3 of your controlled resources (not of the contested type), and then draw that many new resources.
Discard a resource (not of the contested type). If you don't, remove this mech from battle and disable it.
Choose a mech from the shop: swap this mech with the chosen mech
When it is your turn to play to the arena, you may instead disable this mech from your hand to draw a resource from your deck.
The mech with lowest power wins.
